presets.content: We la pye we ya ja pye ni koŋɔn binɛgbɔhɔki ni wo lapye ɲɛɛŋɛ fuŋɔn (tɛgi) lamɛrigɛɛn fiige foroba lapye (USAID) Vision Mondiale na fora ɔstralien gbavɛrinama binɛɲɛɛŋɛ kamapyevɛɛ nɔhɔpireti All Children Reading: A Grand Challenge for Development (ACD GCD) lapyeɲɛɛɲɛ collaboration avec la Global Book Alliance leeyapye SIL LEAD, Inc. We sɛmu we fuŋɔn keere ni pii p’a lapye wu tɛgi gema naha jo (ACR GCD) Global Alliance. Wu fuŋɔn keere ni pee mo wii kaŋaan ɲɛ nigi gbangban wɛ wu fugɔn keere ni wu ɲɛri kana ɲɛ ki yɛ pyaa (ACR GCD) wu fuŋɔn ni wɛ. Lee bɛ kadugo piingɛ bɛri ba ta wu ɲɛrikana ni lee ɲɛ (ACR GCD) wu fin wɛ.
